PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04242023-05-11ND
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisRe-appointment of LARRY MURRAY, C.M., of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Chairperson of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of four years, effective May 29, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of LARRY MURRAY, C.M., of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Chairperson of the Independent Review Panel for Defence Acquisition, to hold office for a term of four years, effective May 29, 2023.
